Her family is now raising money for a repatriation flight to Auckland.

Auckland Anniversary floods: Fast-rising water took Dave Young’s life - widow https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-anniversary-floods-fast-rising-water-took-dave-youngs-life-widow/QE5N5IH43FEFTD4LYBNB3QY3UE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-anniversary-floods-fast-rising-water-took-dave-youngs-life-widow/QE5N5IH43FEFTD4LYBNB3QY3UE/ Cherie HowieFamily 'forever grateful' for neighbours' brave bids to save her husband, Jane Young says. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 22:23:13 +0000 Dave Young, who died at Onewhero during the major flooding in Auckland and neighbouring areas a year ago today, enjoyed the "happiest years of his life" after emigrating to New Zealand from the United Kingdom in 2007.
